meanings.definition: A meat and vegetable dish covered with pastry and baked.
meanings.sent1: I enjoyed a delicious potpie for dinner last night.
meanings.sent2: My mom makes the best potpie with chicken and vegetables.
meanings.sent3: The potpie was so tasty, it disappeared in seconds!
meanings.sent4: Her cooking skills turned the potpie into a masterpiece.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the freshly baked potpie filled the kitchen.

meanings.definition: A pie filled with meat and vegetables.
meanings.sent1: The potpie at the restaurant was flavorful and hearty.
meanings.sent2: I bought a frozen potpie to have for lunch today.
meanings.sent3: The potpie looked so good, I almost wanted to frame it!
meanings.sent4: The potpie was a savory treasure hidden beneath the golden crust.
meanings.sent5: With each bite, the delicious flavors of the potpie danced on my taste buds.
